# API Reference for cdktf.LazyAnyValueOptions

   LazyAnyValueOptions <a name="LazyAnyValueOptions" id="cdktf.LazyAnyValueOptions"></a>
  
  Options for creating lazy untyped tokens.
  
  # Initializer <a name="Initializer" id="cdktf.LazyAnyValueOptions.Initializer"></a>
  
  ```go
  import "github.com/hashicorp/terraform-cdk-go/cdktf"
  
  &cdktf.LazyAnyValueOptions {
  	DisplayHint: *string,
  	OmitEmptyArray: *bool,
  }
  ```
  
  # Properties <a name="Properties" id="Properties"></a>
  
  | **Name** | **Type** | **Description** |
  | --- | --- | --- |
  | <code><a href="#cdktf.LazyAnyValueOptions.property.displayHint">DisplayHint</a></code> | <code>*string</code> | Use the given name as a display hint. |
  | <code><a href="#cdktf.LazyAnyValueOptions.property.omitEmptyArray">OmitEmptyArray</a></code> | <code>*bool</code> | If the produced value is an array and it is empty, return 'undefined' instead. |
  
  ---
  
  ## `DisplayHint`<sup>Optional</sup> <a name="DisplayHint" id="cdktf.LazyAnyValueOptions.property.displayHint"></a>
  
  ```go
  DisplayHint *string
  ```
  
  - *Type:* *string
  - *Default:* No hint
  
  Use the given name as a display hint.
  
  ---
  
  ## `OmitEmptyArray`<sup>Optional</sup> <a name="OmitEmptyArray" id="cdktf.LazyAnyValueOptions.property.omitEmptyArray"></a>
  
  ```go
  OmitEmptyArray *bool
  ```
  
  - *Type:* *bool
  - *Default:* false
  
  If the produced value is an array and it is empty, return 'undefined' instead.
  
  ---
